price: (18) Already Allāh knows the hinderers[1187] among you and those [hypocrites] who say to their brothers, "Come to us,"[1188] and do not go to battle, except for a few,[1189]
arabic: ۞ قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُعَوِّقِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلۡقَآئِلِينَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡ هَلُمَّ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡبَأۡسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
footnotes:
[1187]- Those who dissuade others from supporting the Prophet (ﷺ) in battle.
[1188]- Rather than joining the Prophet (ﷺ).
[1189]- Who went out of ulterior motives.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qad yaʿlamu al-lahu al-muʿawiqīna minkum wal-qāilīna li-ikh'wānihim halumma ilaynā walā yatūna al-basa illā qalīlan
